--- title: "Exploratory Data Analysis" subtitle: "Uncovering Patterns in the Job Market Dataset" author: - name: Group 10 affiliations: - id: bu name: Boston University city: Boston state: MA format: html: toc: true number-sections: true df-print: paged --- # Introduction This EDA explores key characteristics of the job postings dataset, including salary distribution, industry representation, geographic trends, and temporal patterns. The analysis provides insights that guide downstream tasks such as skill gap analysis, clustering, and prediction. # Dataset Overview ::: {#2f058ec9 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv('region_analysis/lightcast_job_postings.csv') df.info() df.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` C:\Users\honga\AppData\Local\Temp\ipykernel_32160\1554311625.py:3: DtypeWarning: Columns (19,30) have mixed types. ``` ::: ::: # Handling Missing Data ::: {#5c89b52e .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.isnull().mean().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` ACTIVE_SOURCES_INFO 0.892163 MAX_YEARS_EXPERIENCE 0.883721 MAX_EDULEVELS_NAME 0.774959 MAX_EDULEVELS 0.774959 LIGHTCAST_SECTORS 0.754655 LIGHTCAST_SECTORS_NAME 0.754655 SALARY 0.575050 SALARY_FROM 0.553119 SALARY_TO 0.553119 ORIGINAL_PAY_PERIOD 0.553119 dtype: float64 ``` ::: ::: # Salary Distribution ::: {#513145ec .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns df['SALARY'] = pd.to_numeric(df['SALARY'], errors='coerce') plt.figure(figsize=(10,6)) sns.histplot(df['SALARY'], bins=50, kde=True) plt.title("Salary Distribution") plt.xlabel("Salary ($)") plt.ylabel("Frequency") plt.xlim(0, 300000) plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3) plt.tight_layout() plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](eda_updation_files/figure-html/cell-4-output-1.png){} ::: ::: # Top 10 Job Titles ::: {#39dba34d .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['TITLE_NAME'].value_counts().head(10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` TITLE_NAME Data Analysts 8591 Unclassified 3149 Business Intelligence Analysts 2072 Enterprise Architects 1999 Oracle Cloud HCM Consultants 1042 Data Modelers 668 Data Governance Analysts 628 Data Analytics Engineers 537 ERP Business Analysts 488 Data Quality Analysts 467 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: # Top 10 Industries ::: {#a2fe85ee .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['NAICS_2022_2_NAME'].value_counts().head(10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ``` NAICS_2022_2_NAME Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services 23315 Unclassified Industry 9488 Administrative and Support and Waste Management and Remediation Services 8628 Finance and Insurance 7342 Manufacturing 4827 Information 3967 Health Care and Social Assistance 2877 Wholesale Trade 2141 Educational Services 2004 Retail Trade 1953 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: # Job Postings by State ::: {#53695516 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} state_counts = df['STATE_NAME'].value_counts().head(15) state_counts.plot(kind='barh', figsize=(10,6), color='steelblue') plt.title("Top 15 States by Job Postings") plt.xlabel("Number of Postings") plt.gca().invert_yaxis() plt.grid(True, linestyle='--', alpha=0.5) plt.tight_layout() plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](eda_updation_files/figure-html/cell-7-output-1.png){} ::: ::: # Posting Trends Over Time ::: {#ff3f541d .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['POSTED'] = pd.to_datetime(df['POSTED'], errors='coerce') df['POSTED'].dt.to_period('M').value_counts().sort_index().plot(kind='line', figsize=(12,6)) plt.title("Job Postings Over Time") plt.ylabel("Number of Postings") plt.xlabel("Month") plt.grid(True, alpha=0.5) plt.tight_layout() plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](eda_updation_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){} ::: ::: :::
